attributes.additional_details: Child care cost should be covered for Parents returning to work. If after maternity  is finished a mother must return to work or claim Jobseekers allowance then the cost of child care should be met by the goverment so that his is possible. Childcare cost are so high that a mother returning to work for minimum wage is just working to pay for child care. The goverment needs to help those willing to help themselves.
